system.description: Your Maglev Coils allow you to hover above the ground, gliding gracefully across terrain and slowing your falls.
system.benefit: As a Half Action, can hover 20-30 centimetres off of the ground for 1d10+TB Minutes. Must use Half Action each round to maintain. This can slow falls, reducing your fall damage to a maximum of 1d10+3 Impact. Exhausts Potentia Coil and cannot be used until it is recharged.

specialAbilities.name: Hover
specialAbilities.description: Half Action: Activate your Maglev Coils to hover 20-30cm above the ground for 1d10+TB minutes. Requires a Half Action each round to maintain. Reduces fall damage to maximum 1d10+3 Impact. Exhausts Potentia Coil until recharged.
